Heirs Holdings bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-etinye ego nke ezinụlọ nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Lagos Steeti, Naịjirịa nwere mmasị itinye ego na ngalaba dị iche iche n'Afrịka.
Elumelu, CON guzobere Heirs Holdings n'afọ 2010 mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 2010 site na United Bank for Africa (UBA) Plc, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa otu.
N'afọ 2011, Heirs Holdings tinyere ego mbụ ya site n'inweta òkè na Transcorp, nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na-edepụta na Naịjirịa.
N'afọ 2012, Heirs Holdings tinyere ego ọzọ na ụlọ na ngalaba ego
Afriland Properties Plc, ụlọ ọrụ njikwa ihe onwunwe, itinye ego, na mmepe; United Capital Plc, otu ọrụ ego na itinye ego; na Africa Prudential Registrar Plc, onye na-enye ọrụ ndebanye aha.

N'afọ 2013, Heirs Holdings tinyere US $ 2.5bn, dị ka otu nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na-etinye ego na President Barack Obama Power Africa Initiative na ebumnuche ịgbakwunye puku iri atọ MW nke ikike mmepụta ọkụ eletrik ọhụrụ, iji mụbaa ohere ọkụ eletrik site na ọ dịkarịa ala nde njikọ ọhụrụ nde iri isii na Sub-Saharan Afrịka.
N'afọ 2020, Heirs Holdings nwetara OML17 n'aka Shell, Total na Eni n'ihe a kpọrọ nnukwu azụmahịa mmanụ na gas n'Afrịka maka afọ 2020.
A na-ahazi itinye ego nke ndị nketa n'ime isii: Ọrụ ego, Ike, Mmanụ na Gas, Real Estate, Hospitality na Healthcare.
Ndị nketa Holdings nwere mmasị na itinye ego na ọrụ ego na-ebelata ụlọ akụ, mkpuchi, itinye ego na ụlọ akụ, njikwa akụ na ndebanye aha ahịa.
Ntinye ego na mmepe ihe onwunwe na ọrụ njikwa ụlọ ọrụ.
Ntinye ego na ngalaba Power, Oil & Gas
Ntinye ego ndị a bụ akụkụ nke Heirs Holdings na-etinye aka na atụmatụ USAIDs Power Africa.
Ntinye ego na ụlọ ọrụ ahụike, ngwá ọrụ, na ọrụ.
